revised_title: A Comprehensive Plan for Meteorological Observations and Record-Keeping
tldr: The author proposes a detailed plan for recording and organizing meteorological observations, including a method for keeping a diary of the weather and descriptions of machines to aid in data collection. The plan aims to improve our understanding of the atmosphere and its impact on health and trade, as well as to contribute to the development of atmospheric science.
scientific_discipline: Environmental and Earth Sciences > Atmospheric Science
